thread.title: BRIEF-Rights issue in Trustbuddy suspended
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Rights issue in Trustbuddy suspended | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Rights issue in Trustbuddy suspended
text:
Oct 12 TrustBuddy AB :
* Ongoing rights issue in Trustbuddy suspended
* Peer-to-peer platform closed after suspected misconduct within the company
* Says board of directors will prepare a control balance sheet and are currently evaluating all available options in order to find a viable solution for all parties Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
